title: Cooperation by state departments
context: ยง46-15.5 Cooperation by state departments. All state departments, including the departments of human services and health, shall cooperate with the counties with respect to administrative inspections conducted under section 46-15.4, by providing information: (1) Regarding probable violations of the conditions of a license under section 445-95; (2) Regarding the probable operation of a lodging or tenement house, group home, group residence, group living arrangement, hotel, boardinghouse, or restaurant; or (3) That may be used to satisfy the probable cause requirement of section 46-15.4. [L 1987, c 333, pt of ยง1; am L 1989, c 261, ยง3]
